  groups:

    name: group1
  - gid: 1050
    name: group2
  - gid: 1060
    name: user3

    name: user1

    - ssh-rsa 
      root@localhost

    expires: "1970-01-01"

    - ssh-rsa 
      root@localhost
    uid: 1020
  - expires: "1970-01-01"
    gid: 1060
    name: user3
    uid: 1060
fips:
  enabled: true
fsnodes:
- contents:
    text: |
      [Unit]
      Description=Custom service

      [Service]
      ExecStart=/usr/bin/false

      [Install]
      WantedBy=multi-user.target
  mode: "0644"
  path: /etc/systemd/system/custom.service
  type: file
- contents:
    text: |
      [Service]
      ExecStart=
      ExecStart=/usr/bin/cat /etc/custom_file.txt
  mode: "0644"
  path: /etc/systemd/system/custom.service.d/override.conf
  type: file
- contents:
    text: image builder is the best
  group: root
  mode: "0644"
  path: /etc/custom_file.txt
  type: file
  user: root
- group: "0"
  mode: "0644"
  path: /etc/empty_file.txt
  type: file
  user: "0"
- mode: "0755"
  path: /etc/systemd/system/custom.service.d
  type: dir
- group: "1050"
  mode: "0770"
  path: /etc/custom_dir
  type: dir
  user: "1020"
hostname: my-host
kernel:
  cmdline_append:
  - debug
locale:
  keyboards:
  - dvorak
  languages:
  - el_CY.UTF-8
systemd:
  disabled:
  - bluetooth.service
  enabled:
  - sshd.service
  - custom.service

  ntp_servers:
  - time.example.com
  timezone: Europe/London
